title: los lpices de toda la vida
review: product overview hoy quiero compartir mi experiencia con el lpiz staedler noris este paquete de  lpices de dureza variada es la herramienta perfecta para aquellos que amamos dibujar tomar notas o simplemente disfrutar de la escritura a mano nuestra experiencia desde que adquir este set de lpices los he utilizado en diversas ocasiones y los resultados han sido sobresalientes he probado su uso en diferentes tipos de papel y el rendimiento es excepcional la suavidad con la que desliza el trazo es impresionante y permite un control absoluto sobre el grosor de las lneas adems el borrado es limpio y sin dejar rastros lo que me ha permitido realizar correcciones sin problemas destacados una de las caractersticas destacadas de este lpiz es su durabilidad a pesar de utilizarlos intensivamente no se gastan fcilmente y conservan su forma afilada por mucho tiempo lo cual es excelente para un dibujante como yo tambin me ha sorprendido la ergonoma de estos lpices ya que su diseo proporciona un agarre cmodo y facilita la escritura o el dibujo durante perodos prolongados de tiempo mejoras en cuanto a mejoras no he encontrado ninguna deficiencia significativa en estos lpices han cumplido con todas mis expectativas y no he tenido problemas con el producto hasta el momento relacin preciocalidad al evaluar la relacin preciocalidad de los lpices staedler noris considero que ofrecen una excelente relacin si bien su precio es ligeramente superior a otros lpices en el mercado la calidad y durabilidad que brindan compensan completamente ese aspecto adems al ser un paquete de  lpices su precio se vuelve an ms atractivo ya que obtienes una variedad de durezas en un solo paquete calificacin general en resumen mi experiencia con los lpices staedler noris ha sido sumamente positiva su calidad durabilidad y desempeo han superado mis expectativas no dudo en recomendarlos a cualquier persona que busque una herramienta de escritura o dibujo confiable y de alta calidad por todo lo anterior califico este producto con  estrellas y definitivamente contina siendo mi eleccin favorita para todas mis necesidades artsticas y de escritura una excelente adquisicin para cualquier amante del arte y la escritura a mano

title: great fabercastell leads once one of the mechanical issue was sorted out
review: pack of three mechanical pencils the  and  work fine the  was problematic the lead graphite inside constantly broke when pressing the top to reveal more of the  lead and it intermittently slipped back into the barrel of the pencil when you finally get the lead to emerge and put it to paper i had to remove bits of the broken lead and the other two leads inside the pencil make sure no small lengths left inside then very carefully insert a single  lead and started again this problem seems to be solved  so far  now that there is only one  lead in the pencil this is a mechanical issue not the leads in the pencils these are excellent and produce smooth and consistent marks on the paper used in conclusion initial disappointment from usual excellent fabercastell products but will monitor and report back

title: faber castell tk  fine lead pencil wallet of
review: i purchased this pack out of convenience as i needed a  for my illustrative work quickly i had already owned a faber castell  mechanical pencil but it broke from a jam due to the fine lead i assumed it was a fluke i really should have learnt from my first experience but i had the exact same issue with the  from this pack it took  months for it to stop working after consistent feeding issues either not coming out to the whole lead sliding out of the pencil something i would expect from a off brand mechanical pencilas for  and  they are are fine but honestly dont bring anything any to the table that any other cheaper mechanical pencil or in fact a well sharpened standard graphite pencil would offer lead is nice i guess if a little frail but you can just buy the lead separately and put it into another better pencil they also look nice with good grip and handling but other brands offer that luxury for cheaperlooking at other reviews this is a common problem for anyone who actually attempts to use this pencil i would not recommend this set

prod_name: staedtler 120-0 noris graphite pencils - 2b (box of 12), black
title: los lpices de toda la vida
review: product overview hoy quiero compartir mi experiencia con el lpiz staedler noris este paquete de  lpices de dureza variada es la herramienta perfecta para aquellos que amamos dibujar tomar notas o simplemente disfrutar de la escritura a mano nuestra experiencia desde que adquir este set de lpices los he utilizado en diversas ocasiones y los resultados han sido sobresalientes he probado su uso en diferentes tipos de papel y el rendimiento es excepcional la suavidad con la que desliza el trazo es impresionante y permite un control absoluto sobre el grosor de las lneas adems el borrado es limpio y sin dejar rastros lo que me ha permitido realizar correcciones sin problemas destacados una de las caractersticas destacadas de este lpiz es su durabilidad a pesar de utilizarlos intensivamente no se gastan fcilmente y conservan su forma afilada por mucho tiempo lo cual es excelente para un dibujante como yo tambin me ha sorprendido la ergonoma de estos lpices ya que su diseo proporciona un agarre cmodo y facilita la escritura o el dibujo durante perodos prolongados de tiempo mejoras en cuanto a mejoras no he encontrado ninguna deficiencia significativa en estos lpices han cumplido con todas mis expectativas y no he tenido problemas con el producto hasta el momento relacin preciocalidad al evaluar la relacin preciocalidad de los lpices staedler noris considero que ofrecen una excelente relacin si bien su precio es ligeramente superior a otros lpices en el mercado la calidad y durabilidad que brindan compensan completamente ese aspecto adems al ser un paquete de  lpices su precio se vuelve an ms atractivo ya que obtienes una variedad de durezas en un solo paquete calificacin general en resumen mi experiencia con los lpices staedler noris ha sido sumamente positiva su calidad durabilidad y desempeo han superado mis expectativas no dudo en recomendarlos a cualquier persona que busque una herramienta de escritura o dibujo confiable y de alta calidad por todo lo anterior califico este producto con  estrellas y definitivamente contina siendo mi eleccin favorita para todas mis necesidades artsticas y de escritura una excelente adquisicin para cualquier amante del arte y la escritura a mano

title: noir cest noiril y a encore de lespoir
review: si vous cherchez un mix entre le fusain le crayon fusain  le crayon graphite alors ces crayons sont faits pour vous enrichis en carbone les noirs sont vraiment trs profonds les crayons sont jolis  solides et la boite en mtal qui leur sert dcrin est vraiment collector tant elle est jolieaux personnes qui souvent disent il ny a pas de diffrence en ces crayons  la gamme de  de chez faber castell je rpondrai que si il en existe une mme primordiale  lon peut regarder ses dessins sous tous les angles il ny aura pas ce fcheux effet brillance ici le dessin est mat et dun noir soutenubref du staedtler pur  dur sur les photos de mon dessin en cours de cration le roi grizzly je nai utilis que des lumograph black du hb au b

prod_name: staedtler 100b g6 mars lumograph pencils, black, pack of 6
title: iconic pencil
review: these are excellent premium quality pencils by staedtler for sketching there are  x mm pencils in total ranging from h to b the degrees of softness are h h f hb b b b b b b b b they are presented in a nice metal tin which provides good protection and easy access the highly distinctive blue silver and black top livery is iconic and it hasnt changed in yearsi have used these pencils before and they have never let me down this set is excellent for building up tone in portrait or landscape sketches for example they sharpen well without splintering and are comfortable to hold and use the graphite is super smooth on paper and does not scratch at all like cheaper pencils the graphite also erases easily so you can perfect your work there is something very nice and satisfying about a good quality pencil like this one this is a great set for any artist or student alike recommended

prod_name: staedtler 100b g6 mars lumograph pencils, black, pack of 6
title: beautiful quality pencils
review: beautiful and quality pencils these pencils are pretty much the benchmark for their quality of material and standard tonal values ie the blacknesshardness the casing material is of great wood qualitymars lumograph  series pencils have a little metallic lustre when drawn on paper so if you dont want any metallic shining on your drawings then you can buy lumograph matt black series pencils instead both kinds have their particular usefulness and none of it inferior to the other i love these pencils for technical drawing purposesi recieved the box in time and in a packaging of amazon polybag the tin box has a little dent on it but thats okay one of the pencils f grade seems to have manufacturing defect it seems it was broken and then was glued and painted over it so that can possibly be a disappointment once i use the pencil enough to reach the point of the wood cleavage and if then it happens to be unusable however there is no match to staedtler for quality art supplies for professionalsan advice to beginner artists it is always advisable to start your art journey from average quality and cheaper pencils as long as their tonal grades are consistent i highly feel that expensive pencils are meant for professional artists if money is a constraint once you graduate into a better and experienced artist go ahead and buy these beautiful standard pencils

prod_name: staedtler 100b g6 mars lumograph pencils, black, pack of 6
title: staedtler mars lumograph black finalmente ombre nere e opache
review: ho acquistato queste matite mars lumograph black perch ero rimasto molto contento della grafite b della stessa marca contenuta nellottimo set da  mars lumograph normali anchesso in vendita su amazonin effetti questa grafite mars lumograph b  particolarissima molto nera e quasi grassa  poco cancellabile come se fosse una matita colorata ed in breve  diventata la mia preferita allego la palette dellintero set a lato di un piccolo bozzetto che feci tempo fa per esemplificare luso delle varie gradazioni di grafite allora che sono venuto a conoscenza di questo nuovo tipo di matite della staedtler sempre mars lumograph ma di tipo black anchesse in grafite ma di colore molto pi nero del normale per la presenza di una pi alta percentuale di carbone vedendole in vendita qui su amazon le ho acquistate per curiositfatta esclusione per la b del set mars lumograph normale che  del tutto simile con la b di tipo black le altre gradazioni non sono da confondere per in quanto a resa grafica n con quelle in normale grafite n con le matite a carboncinodelle prime non hanno quei fastidiosi riflessi lucidi avendo una finitura opaca e delle seconde non possiedono la friabilit propria del carbonesono pastose e poco cancellabili come se fossero delle matite colorate nere ma a differenza di queste sono sfumabili anche con le dita hanno una mina resistentissima e molto affilabile e soprattutto sono di quattro gradazioni diverse la confezione comprende due matite di gradazione b due b una b e una bio le uso spesso e con piacere perch queste matite black consentono agli amanti di questo tipo di tecnica semplicemente ripassando un sottile strato sulle zone fatte con la grafite normale dove si vuole che sia reso un nero pi profondo di attenuare anche leffetto lucido tipico della grafitequeste mars lumograph black sono un complemento anche per chi ama disegnare con il carboncino le rifiniture i particolari e le ombre pi scure possono essere aggiunte con profitto dopo la stesura del fissatore ottenendo risultati molto convincentiallego tra le immagini il confronto tra la matita lumograph in normale grafite di gradazione b e la sua gemella b lumograph black entrambe hanno la mina di diametro maggiore delle altre gradazioni ben  mm mentre per le black b b e b il diametro  di le mars lumograph black sono contenute in una pratica scatola metallica con una funzionale cerniera apribile molto comoda per coloro che disegnano sovente anche allaperto o in altre svariate condizioni ambientali ed inoltre al di l dellabituale eleganza riportano intelligentemente su ognuna delle sei facce la gradazione caratteristica comodissima per un disegnatoreconsiglio a tutti gli appassionati di disegno professionisti e non lacquisto delle lumograph black perch la resa  in definitiva qualcosa di diverso diverso dalle grafiti diverso dai carboncini diverso dalle matite colorate si ha un ibrido di cui davvero si sentiva la mancanza a livello graficopsora che sto scrivendo noto che ne hanno prodotto un kit in cui le matite lumograph black sono tutte di gradazioni diverse avendo aggiunto la hb e la b le acquister non appena nanizzate questespero di esservi stato utile

title: great art pencils
review: the original staedtler lumograph b eb was always my favorite but the b  b ee never quite fit in with the rest of the lumograph drawing pencils they were a carbon  graphite mix while the rest of the grades are graphite having them split into two lines gives so much more options they are nice  dark as dark as cretacolor neros  darker than faber castell matte but not as smooth as either you can feel just a bit of grab on the paper you can erase but minimally  smudgingblending with stumps or tortillons is also minimal but that helps make sketchbook drawings stay less messy this is a great  useful addition to any drawing toolkit

title: mejores cuanto ms los usas
review: he usado todo tipo de lpices negros para los tonos oscuros desde grafitos de distintas marcas pasando por carbones normales comprimidos grasos los cont  pasteles negros  bien por vaguera o porque soy demasiado principiante para darme cuenta voy buscando un tipo de lpiz que me permita negros intensos pero que luego no tenga que andar con fijadores para que no se me vaya o se traspase a la hoja de al lado los cont igual se acercaban un poco pero siguen manchando all por donde pasanestos cayeron en mis manos despus de ver varios anlisis al principio me resultaba algo extraa la sensacin ya que no son suaves como un grafito son como una cera dura pero los resultados me gustaron mucho alcanzan negros mucho ms intensos que un grafito aunque el steadtler normal b no est nada mal y no tienes ese brillo del grafito que puede ser molesto a medida que los usas y te acostumbras vas obteniendo mejores resultados y te van gustando ms se quedan bastante bien en el papel no difuminan mal no manchan ni necesitan de fijador la cajita donde vienen en un buen detalle y el precio por  lpices est muy bienun excelente producto que va a gustar a los amantes del dibujo a lpiz

prod_name: mechanical pencil pentel pg1013-e graphgear1000, line width 0.3 mm, rubber (z2-1n), 1 piece
title: by far my favorite mechanical pencil
review: i like this pencil so much i purchased all  sizes this time     and   my favorite lead is b  its softer and much darker than the standard hb hhard the lead range is h hto hb bb b  when im checking construction sites i use  to write erasable info on wood walls and other materials wet or dry regardless of temperatures not so with sharpies and wax pencils in the office i use  and  for paperwork blueprints etc the british alltime favorite is  i use the  for adding tiny details to building drawings and it matches my love for  gelink ultrafine pensgraphgear s are great mechanical pencils the only ones with fully retractable pencil points i use pentel clicking erasers instead of the endcaps it seems like too much work to stop writing pulloff the endcap erase then put it back on in half that time ive grabbed an eraser and done  i had the same problem with the  pencil breaking like a couple of other amazon reviewers that blue ring in the middle of the pencil is plastic which i didnt know until i found my pencil broken easy fix though i put the two pieces back together and taped it super tight with black electrical tape  the good stuff m temflex temflex is very durable stretches a little resistant to both water and extreme temperatures  weeks later my pencil still works like new and looks good i kind of like the black tape its one more way of knowing which pencils are mine electrical tape comes in many colors i plan to tape my other pencils too so far my new replacement  is not needednote the price of lead refills varies a lot across amazon also pentel has two sources ain pentel is from japan im guessing the other is from china rotring staedtler and mars are brands wellknown by engineers architects and draftsmen  fabercastell is wellknown in the art world presently i trying mr pen because i really like their gel highlighters and lower prices so far no complaints but i have both ain pentel and pentel waiting in the wings also i dont care about the little bar code sticker on all my pencils because my hands never touch it except during lead refilling buy the graphgear  its pricey but worth it if you write with pencil a lot

prod_name: mechanical pencil pentel pg1013-e graphgear1000, line width 0.3 mm, rubber (z2-1n), 1 piece
title: excelente calidad
review: tiene una buena relacin preciocalidad tiene el costo de portaminas de plstico y al menos en el exterior es metlico su peso es muy adecuado para sostenerlo en la mano cmodamente adems que tiene un mecanismo que lo hace retrctil escondiendo la punta cuando lo transportas por dos razones no te rompes las camisas con la punta y se protege est cuando hay cadas del portaminas la punta no se daa tengo las cuatro medidas desde  mm hasta  mm todas tienen la misma calidad y el mismo peso fcil de distinguir por los colores lo nico que les falta es que le impriman la graduacin en la tapa porque viene solo con una etiqueta adhesiva que se caer con el tiempo probablemente las gomas que tiene en la sujecin permite una buena y cmoda sujecin siempre y cuando no tengas crema en las manos o estn hmedas en ese caso se vuelve muy resbaloso en general es muy recomendable por su costo y su buen diseo y calidad

prod_name: mechanical pencil pentel pg1013-e graphgear1000, line width 0.3 mm, rubber (z2-1n), 1 piece
title: if you want a pencil this is the one
review: as a student i write for hours each day taking notes and doing tests after using the graphgear  mm for over a year i can never go back to wood pencils or even other mechanical onesits made almost completely from metal and its enjoyable to write withthe retractable sleeve is extremely convenient because when im in a rush i can toss the pencil in my pocket and not worry about it bendinganother unique thing about this pencil is that the clip has a spring so its easy to usewhen writing for a long time it feels topheavy but the weight is also positive because it leads to a smoother writing experiencethe eraser is relatively small so i would recommend not using it and instead buy some block erasers such as the pentel hipolymers ones which i loveone piece of advice for using the graphgear when you retract the tip it uses quite a bit of force and i imagine it could possibly damage the pencil over time i always cover the cap with my index finger so it can be let back slowly and gentlyive purchased  and given them as gifts to some of my friendsif i were to make any changes i would get rid of the rubber on the grip i love pencils  pens with just metal knurling such as the zebra fxmd peni also like using the kurutoga roulette pencil because it rotates and has a better grip however i prefer the graphgear  because the metal feels premium and the retractable tip prevents any bending

title: amazing mech pencils highly recommended best ive ever used
review: these pencils are amazing and worth every penny you twist the bottom to chose between hb so you can have multiple same pencils with different leads and know exactly what is inside you click the clip at the top and the nib goes in so makes it safer for storage another little positive touch the make and feel of these screams quality theyre a good weight and the grip is perfectly comfortable they are not cheap but you pay for what you get theyre the best mech pencils ive ever used and i cant see me ever using any others these were highly recommended by many pro artists and im glad i paid good money for them theyre worth it i have a few now and will buy more when i can justify spending the money on more

prod_name: mechanical pencil pentel pg1013-e graphgear1000, line width 0.3 mm, rubber (z2-1n), 1 piece
title: trs bon produit
review: prise en main agrable de ce portemines de belles finitions aussila bague permet facilement dafficher la duret de la mine criture claire et lisible pour le cas du mm blanc sur marron il est galement facile de rgler la sortie de la mine qui se fait petit  petit  on vite ainsi de lavoir trop sortie ou risquer de la casser en voulant la faire rentrer un peuil est galement possible de faire rentrer cette pointe par le biais dun petit mcanisme qui est franchement pratique pour protger les petites parties fragiles susceptibles de sabmer durant les transports chutes ou autrejai t tonn tout de mme de dcouvrir le portemine seul dans une enveloppe  bulles mattendant  un minimum demballage et de protection dautant plus quil provient de ltranger malgr a il est tout de mme arriv en parfait tat le seul petit bmol pour ma part a t la livraison  mauvaise indication sur le site qui ne me permettait pas de suivre lacheminement du colis nanmoins nhsitez pas  contacter le vendeur si vous avez des questions  jai obtenu une rponse ds le lendemain de mon mail avec des explications prcises jai pu ainsi tre redirige vers une autre chane de transport pour suivre mon colis sur les deux semaines indiques jai reu mon colis un mois plus tard soyez patients et conciliants  les vendeurs ne sont pas responsables des retards durant les transports et font au mieux pour vous envoyer vos commandes le plus tt possible en tout cas je ne regrette ni cette attente ni cet achat

prod_name: mechanical pencil pentel pg1013-e graphgear1000, line width 0.3 mm, rubber (z2-1n), 1 piece
title: the best mechanical pencil you are likely to come across
review: in short fulfils all criteria to guarantee an excellent product experiencelooks i have lost track of how many years i have had mine best part of a decade now they still look the business and are often asked about by my clients whilst i am using them one was even stolen so i suppose that makes them quite desirableconstruction the retractable tip is just perfect it has a slight springiness to it that not only cushions the writingdrawing experience but also helps avoid lead breakages although the modern hipoly refills are pretty good in their own right made principally of plastic and aluminium it is light yet very robust the combination of a knurled section and rubber grip is perfect  no readjustment or sweaty finger problems there are no fancy gears that turn the lead around as advertised by other products neither have i ever thought to myself that i need one of those  one less unnecessary mechanism that can go wrong  minimalism  longlasting  happy owneruse always works well very easy to carry around very light solid enough construction to withstand severe punishment  mine has been submerged in water for  days flood while i was away  dropped from a height of over m ft  accidentally dropped in the space between staircase  which obliterated the lead refills inside but the pen works just fine if it was the cheaper plastics varieties of mechanical pencils then they would not have survived im also sure that some of the more expensive varieties will not be able to boast this even if it did stop working replacing them is not going to be too painful as testament to how well these have worked i now have  varieties of these that take different refill sizes as well as a spare mm as my allrounder when i have to jot down or explain anything on the go the oldest one is pushing a decade in age and looksworks like new for the astute fans out there yes they did make minor changes in their construction over the years but not to any detrimentconclusion i have never been let down only pleasantly surprised i would highly recommend this over any other product i have tried including comparisons against other brands that are x more expensive a fantastic product that offers excellent value and many years of great service this product has never disappointed me and im certain that most will agree once they have had the pleasure of using it

prod_name: mechanical pencil pentel pg1013-e graphgear1000, line width 0.3 mm, rubber (z2-1n), 1 piece
title: an excellent mechanical pencil but improvements theoretically possible
review: this is an excellent mechanical pencil  its one you buy to keep not use and dispose of undergraduate students looked at it with awe and respect just kidding there lets not get carried away  its very functional but not the overt display of opulence of products made by jewelersit writes very well and has good balance  the grip has that knurled surface that prevents it from slipping around when for example your hands are wet or dirty  the action advancing the pencil leads is flawless  pencil leads can break when too much lateral pressure is applied but it requires more than most other mechanical pencils  the process of refilling leads is good  no problems therei like the design of that springloaded clip  you ever find yourself upsidedown when you didnt expect it  it stays put in your shirtpocket or when clipped to your shirts collarafter  years i noticed some corrosion on the barrel of one i purchased  this occurred after repeated exposure to humidity from being on the bathroom counter near the shower  you wouldnt have that problem with plastic  some of the graphics looked weathered due to wear  could the black graphics be etched into the barrel  who knows how much a pencil like this would cost howeverthe only weakness is that the eraser inside it underneath the cap tends to slide back when pressure is applied  this doesnt happen with the eraser from the factory but after i installed refills  the eraser holding bracket just didnt grip enough anymore after installing refill erasers  and so the eraser didnt stay put making erasure difficult and frustrating  i know its my own fault with big trumplike hands  after putting in a new eraser i couldnt reform that bracket exactly again  i believe that some writers might never use that eraser opting instead for a separate oneoverall a great product for those who need better than just a cheap throwaway pencil

prod_name: mechanical pencil pentel pg1013-e graphgear1000, line width 0.3 mm, rubber (z2-1n), 1 piece
title: solid metalic wonder
review: pentel was a mechanical pencil masterpiece since i was an elementary school student this pencil provides a modernized experience if you have already experienced the old pentel mechanical pencils these days there are tons of feature packed pencils such as kuru toga delguard etc but this pencil doesnt have such fashionable features while really good at what it has been good at the solid writing experiencethe lead sleeve retraction feature is a nice and unexpected to have in a pentel product but it really helps when you need to be mobile my decade long gripe on pentel px series was the lead pipe bending like crazy if it was handled wrong way which happens a lot in a classroom environment moreover i usually preferred mm version due to my note taking habitthe rubberized pads on textured metal grip is unexpectedly comfy to grip its not as comfortable as the dr grip but at least metal grip does not attract so much dust unlike rubber surface gripsthere is almost nothing to gripe a bit heavy maybe i do not have problem with such weight since i usually prefer writing with ebonite fountain pens with piston mechanism so im kind of used to heavy writing apparatus but if youre not really a fan of heavy writing instruments it might be problematic its not the products fault but personal preference as long as the products weight does not prevent you from even gripping itif youre up for comfortable but stable experience and some lead sleeve protection this is it ive been using it for mainly note taking and journal keeping excelsior to any of my usage scenarios

title: pentel graphgear  mechanical pencil
review: i purchased the  pencil mainly for sketching the pencil is well constructed strong practical good grip and it fits fine in your hand when in use i wouldnt say that it would be the best for writing as the lead is so fine i would say that  and upwards would be best for that task having used pentel standard plastic mechanical pencils for years i thought i would treat myself to something more stylish and long lasting and all i required was built into the graphgear  well worth the money and when i purchased it it had a fair discount on the rrpnow looking at a graphgear fine point pen as i am impressed with the pencil

title: una calidad que cumple con las expectativas de la marca
review: pentel me parece muy buena marca tengo uno de esos lapiceros desechables de pentel y me ha durado ya como  aoseste es uno de esos que si veo en una tienda nunca comprara pero por internet si que dan ganasas que me lo compre y tengo varias cosas que decir sobre estepara empezar no viene empaquetado simplemente viene envuelto en papel de burbujas algo preocupante pero el mio llego en perfectas condicionesal tenerlo en la mano por primera vez te das cuenta de lo pesado que es algo molesto al inicio pero a la larga te acostumbrasla punta es retrctil la palanquita que tiene en el cuerpo sirve para retraerla se nota la calidad de esta no parece que se vaya a romper por nadael apoyo donde van los dedos se siente extrao no voy a mentir pero cumple su funcin como griplas puntas incluidas son bastante buenas algo mas suaves para mi gusto pero he de admitir su calidaden resumen bastante bonito a la vista al principio parece raro pero a la larga te acostumbrasyo lo uso para dibujar pero para escribir es bastante mejor creo yo

prod_name: mechanical pencil pentel pg1013-e graphgear1000, line width 0.3 mm, rubber (z2-1n), 1 piece
title: the best pencil you can buy
review: this is the best pencil you can buy i have tried many other options some for much more money but i have continuously come back to this the design is just so perfect it feels sturdy without being too heavy and the built in practicality is unmatched the eraser is nothing to write home about but in an emergency it does the job and can be easily replaced when it runs out the tip stability is excellent and the feeling ot the grip is surprisingly nice considering its just metal and rubber dots i do with that the dots werent this tacky blue color the grey on the  is much more subtle and astetically pleasing but the writing and usage experience is superb i particularly like how the clip goes into the pencil while its extended so that there is no protruding metal on the barrel while writing these are so nice that i have collected quite a few to give as gifts to peoplethe one problem with this listing in particular is the very sub par shipping they literally just throw the pencil without a case into a bag and ship it i wouldnt be surprised if some of these ended up arriving damaged because of that but all of the ones that ive ordered have been fine

title: impressed
review: ive had this pencil only for a couple days now prior to this pencil i was using a bic mechanical pencil one of the  or so in a package probably a dollar per pencil or lessi write a lot every day and i developed sore muscles in many regions of my hand so i decided it was time i invest in myself and purchase a higherend pencil one that was smooth to write with and comfortable to holdi looked at many pencils from the range of  canadian this one sat at  dollars i believe for the mm i liked the look read some reviews and most of them were quite positive so i decided to try this one outthe case it comes in is nothing special but it is a case for a single mechanical pencil and by no means is it poor its cheap as hopefully most of the  was put into the main man himself the pencilnow the pencil itself has a nice weight to it when i clicked the back end and the front tip shot out i was mad excited to try very smooth writing massive improvement over my previous pencils im gliding on my pages and my writing is a lot cleareralso clicking on the clip will snap the front tip back into its slot pretty neat function but well see how it lasts through the test of timeas for my hand and muscle soreness im feeling a huge decrease in pain after just two days of use with this pencilfor its price and the amount i write its seeming like a very smart purchase

prod_name: derwent graphic soft graphite drawing pencils, ideal for illustrating & shading, set of 12, professional quality, 34215
title: derwents are some of the best around
reviewer: mz nina business consultant and aspiring artist
review: i looove this brand also all their colored pencil lines  i know everyone is prismacolor crazy but it is hype  derwents are just as good and i am a little partial to them simply they are the ones i learn to draw with even as a kid  i remember my first derwent kit that dad bought me  pencils and i was around  and we were living in australiai love the water color pencils the graphite the ink tense that you can actually draw on fabric with and it stays and the color soft line  i also have a few others but those are my favoritesi would say there pencils are as good as any other including prismacolorjust make sure to get the right pencil sharpener no matter what you use  get a derwent battery operated which is still made or a panasonic or a used huntboston all of which are no longer made  do not get xacto it chews your pencils up and constantly breaks the leadinfo on electric pencil sharpenersi am a color pencil artist and you need to have either a panasonic huntboston pencil sharpener otherwise your colored pencils are eaten  never buy xacto for colored pencils xacto will eat your pencils  until you can find a panasonic or huntboston or hunt or boston electric pencil sharpener get this if you can find one or the derwent black model as it had  holes one for a longer tip and one for a shorter tip  i have both  i had bought the derwent one as i have derwent but also use prismacolor and graphite  panasonic and hunt boston are no longer made no matter what anyone says  i was lucky to buy a new panasonic electric pencil sharpener by trolling the net until i found on  bought a used boston model  used on ebay and paid waaaay too much  it was pretty beaten upalso if you do buy used get one in the best quality that you can and just pay the extra i would say up to   i personally would not spend more than that  i paid  for my new panasonicalso xacto bought out huntboston and all new models are a  digit model number the actual huntboston is only a  digit  this issue is that xacto still sells under the hunt boston name and it is misleading as it now uses xacto cutters which do nothing but eat your pencils  i also do not like it when someone lies about what they are sellingi bought what i thought was a hunt electric pencil sharpener it came in a box that had the hunt name and packaging but when i opened it up it was a you guessed right  an xacto  said so right on the sharpenerbought on line here at amazon from overstockcom but i returned it and got a refund including shipping as they were misleadinghope this helps with those of you who are colored pencil artist  get a panasonic huntboston or derwent sharpeneralso run a graphite pencil through your sharpener first thing every day and it will stay sharp longer since colored pencils are waxy and tend to build up on the cutters

prod_name: faber-castell - castell 9000 art set pencil (pack of 6), green
title: good quality
review: its a fact of life and art that if you want to do a decent drawing you need decent pencils and decent paper im just an amateur hobby artist who draws for pleasure but ive been doing it long enough to keep away from poor quality the best pencils ive used are certainly the blackwing range but their shading values are limited and if you want the full scope of hard and soft pencils you have to look elsewhere ive used derwent theyre ok and tombow mono very good but i was given this set of fabercastell  and i thought id try them out for one detailed drawing they are really good i wanted a set that didnt just concentrate on the b grades and this range goes from h to b which gives plenty of scope for light and dark shading i found them nice to use easy to blend and not scratchy like cheaper options sharpening them with a scalpel was easy no breakages and i kept them pointed with some sandpaper they really are nice drawing pencils most artists have their favourites i like mitsubishi hiuni for the full range and there will be fabercastell fans who wouldnt draw with anything else id certainly be happy to use these againi see theyve gone up in price when i purchased this set from amazon in march  they cost  with free postage through the prime system that made them just p a pencil which was a bargain but i see the price has rocketed nevertheless theyre worth considering as an addition to your drawing tools

prod_name: faber-castell - castell 9000 art set pencil (pack of 6), green
title: a bit confused
review: ive used faber cattell watersoluble pencils for some time and i absolutely love them the company also makes pencils with a very slight tint blue green and maybe others these are called green so not unreasonably i thought they were tinted it turns out theyre normal graphite and green seems to refer to a type rather than colour of pencil they come in a green tin on checking i see that my other fb pencils are in a green tin so i didnt get what i wanted however theyre an excellent pencil and i shall carry on using them but im still looking for a green tint

prod_name: faber-castell - castell 9000 art set pencil (pack of 6), green
title: i dont know how i learned without them
review: i dont know why in the world i waited so long to buy some good drawing pencils i have been sketching with whatever mechanical pencil i had in my bag for years with very little preference but the way that my sketches have improved with these pencils has been dramatic now i feel comfortable creating full pieces of art in shades of grey whereas before i would sketch lightly and then use other media to finish the piece after ten years of sketching with in retrospect a highly inferior product i feel confident that these are just what i needed to take the next step toward improvementthese are very high quality they arrive sharpened which is nice since im used to colored pencils that arrive in dozens and take hours to sharpen they sharpen well with a standard or high quality sharpener and the graphite even on the softer pencils is strong enough to not crack in the barrel a problem i had with some student grade pencils in high school art class the case is nice too and has a soft mattelike finish to the touch i imagine it will dent and prove less than perfect if thrust into a backpack pocket full of other materials but if kept in between notebooks it probably has a long life ahead of iti bought a set for my best friend and she is in love too this would make a great gift for any artist in your life and is a good investment for your own arsenal of supplies if you are an artists as well

title: love this pack for the h h h pencils

prod_name: staedtler 7755abk25d mars micro mechanical pencil, 0.5mm (blistercard of 1 + 12 hb lead refills)
title: my favourite mechanical pencil
review: this is my third pencil now of this modelmy first one was stolen by my sister she had one herself but she wanted to take mine on a university trip which involved a lot of time out in the field when she got back she conveniently lost my pencil and not her own i had grounds to believe that it was actually her pencil she lost  which i was eventually proved right when she confessed to her crimeanyway the tension got so heated at one point that she bought me a new one right there on the spot i should add that this argument went on for months i simple wanted a confession thats how much these mechanical pencils mean to uswith my second copy we went the distance together what makes these pencils so great is that they just have this perfect weight and feel it genuinely feels like quality and its rare to find all of the graphite broken inside you can really hit the darker tones of the hb quite effortlessly while being just as able to be used lightly and for speed taking notesi used my first copy back when i was at university i had to do a lot of technical drawings of architecture or infrastructure and i can honestly say that it always allowed me to deliver the quality of drawing that i had in mind my second copy was mostly used for a lot of notetaking and the occasional drawingmy new copy as displayed in the photograph is mostly unused for now i only bought this particular asin because it came with the additional graphite this is only a couple of quid more expensive than just buying the supplies individually  so i figured why not have a backupin any case i am prepared this time if my sister plans on another heist

prod_name: staedtler 7755abk25d mars micro mechanical pencil, 0.5mm (blistercard of 1 + 12 hb lead refills)
title: yer pays yer money and yer makes yer choice
review: i have been using mechanical pencils for many years working my way through a number of brands and the staedtler mars micro is the best i have ever had its particularly strong features are its lead feed mechanism  which is firm and has never given me any trouble  and the comfortable rubberised grip towards the bottom of the barrel for what its worth the pencils appearance is distinctive too and the metal pocket grip doesnt detach itselfi dont remember when i bought my first staedtler but think it must have been at least six years ago i still have it and have just bought three more not because of any problems with the original but because i have gradually lost some others that i had for different places different pockets etcthe leads that come with the pencil  sadly only three as a starter  are superior to ownbrand replacements from stationery chains so i have gone back to paying staedtlers price for   staedtler mars micro carbon mm hb mechanical pencil lead         which is not much less than at least one chains price for  even in experienced hands mine the latter break frequently if someone borrows the pencil they get frustrated because the cheap leads break repeatedly staedtler leads mostly dontso yer pays yer money and yer makes yer choice  mines a staedtler

title: la mejor
review: tuve una igual que me dur  ao usndola todos los das me gust tanto que he repetido la compra he de decir que la anterior la cambi porque me cay y la pis sin querer anteriormente haba utilizado de rotring que aunque no es mala no tiene la punta retrctil y finalmente la goma de agarre se acab rompiendo poco a poco en pedacitos tambin tuve una fabercaster de punta retrctil que es bastante similar a la staedlersta tiene un agarre firme y ergonmico con goma suave en la punta al escribir no resbala ni giraen mi caso tengo la mala costumbre de hacer demasiada fuerza al escribir por lo que las minas de  las devoro teniendo que usar en una lapicera normal minas de  mm con ellas el trazo para escritura en mi opinin queda demasiado ancho y ensucia mucho el papel gracias a portaminas como esta y su punta retrctil puedo utilizar minas de  porque ese movimiento de muelle que tiene en la punta absorbe la fuerza que hago de msotra cosa que debo decir es que si tienes la tcnica de girar la lapicera a la vez que vas escribiendo para ir afilando la mina con este portaminas puedes hacerlo de forma cmoda gracias al agarre simtrico que tieneas que estoy encantado con ella y si ests buscando un portaminas de calidad a un buen precio yo no me lo pensara ms es la tuya

prod_name: staedtler 7755abk25d mars micro mechanical pencil, 0.5mm (blistercard of 1 + 12 hb lead refills)
title: loved it so much i bought it twice
review: absolutely loved this mechanical pencil i sadly lost the original one and didnt need to think twice before buying a second one i found the first one so now i have twothe quality is great and the lead is strong but not too brittle the pencil is not as dark as other hb pencils which isnt really a problem for me as i use it for technical drawings rather than shading after about a years use the silver painting on my pencil began to wear away but that is the only difference between this one and my old onemy only problem with the product is the lead refill the price of the product is great as the refill on its own is a good percentage of the price of the pen with the refill included however the little tube the lead is in is not very secure i left it in a small pencil case and after a few weeks the lid had fallen out and my refills had all been smashed to pieces i was a little disappointed by this as i had been using cheap lead refills when doing sketches and using the staedtler lead sparingly and as mentioned before the refills on their own are quite expensive but worth it considering how many other wooden pencils i would have gone through had i not switched to mechanical

review: por mecanismo interno tengo desde hace aos un primo de este el grip  tambin en  mm  con tan buena opinin de este grip plus quera tenerlo y probarlo a buen preciolo que digo en el ttulo lo cumple es un portaminas con buena prestancia pese a ser de plstico hasta el clip y se siente estupendamente en la mano tambin tiene pinta metlica como si fuera la de un bolgrafo retrctil  y con amortiguacin para proteger la mina de rotura como todos los grippero es mejorableno hay que pagar en exceso por l pues es un portaminas muy de plstico llegando incluso al mecanismo interno el embrague y garras que sujetan y gestionan el avance de la mina son en plstico no de latn  est fabricado en japn lo que es una garantay por esto ltimo es mejorable  este portaminas tiene varios primoshermanos bajo diferentes marcas con leves diferencias estticas  por lo que tengo entendido el diseo base y general lo fabrica el grupo kotobuki kotobuki group  varios de sus primos de los que por las normas no mencionar marcas ni modelos optan por ejemplo por un clip metlico que creo que es ms conveniente para este estilo de portaminas y lo hara ms duradero no obstante el grip  o el ms delgado y tambin de fabricacin japonesa grip  tienen clips metlicos  cuidad del de plstico que son ms propensos a romperviene envuelto en un par de bolsitas de plstico transparente una de ellas hermtica del tipo zip  quizs algo escaso de proteccin tambin viene cargado con  minas de la casa creo que en dureza b  blandas muy suaves y bastante apropiadas para escribir con estos portaminas aprovechando el contar con la mina amortiguada ante excesos de presin contra el papellos colores son preciosos por otros productos de la casa que comparten los de este modelo lo s  no decepcionar ninguno todos muy elegantes y aptos para toda ocasin y uso  y este rojo granate tampoco es la excepcin le queda espectacularpese a los puntos mejorables no obstante es bastante recomendable  es normal que tenga buena fama  as que si te hace tiln y est a buen precio o quieres darte el capricho aprieta el gatillo  no creo que te decepcione

title: very good quality  worth a few dollars more
review: i had been using the papermate titanium series pencils for many years and was satisfied  i happened to see these fabercastell pencils online and was intrigued by the photo  i bought the blue red and blackberry with mm lead  these pencils are definitely a step up in quality  they are engineered with a superior ergonomic grip a long twistup eraser and very stable tip  the lead that came with them has just the right hardness and writes smoothly  i like the larger diameter of the pencil and the thin band of metal that is visible above the grip is a nice visual accent  the colored barrels are plastic but the pencil has sufficient weight from the lower metal portion

title: the last pencil youll need
review: ho utilizzato la matita in questione rotring  mina  per un paio di settimane al lavoro tutto il giorno come unico strumento di scrittura e disegno oltre che a casa per diletto o per prendere qualche appunto a caso e quindi mi sento pronto a dare un mio parere sono un impiegato tecnico ingegnere civile in uno studio di ingegneria quindi per una cosa o per laltra in studio scrivo o faccio qualche schizzo prettamente a matita per abitudine soprattutto ma  per dire che ho modo di usarla molto la matita loggetto in questione  costruito in modo impeccabile veramente bella ed elegante e trasmette veramente solidit pi di quanto mi aspettassi il meccanismo di estrazione della punta funziona bene lestrazione della mina per esigenze costruttive non  la pi appagante che abbia mai provato ma va benissimo e il tutto funzione senza incertezze la cosa che pi mi spaventava era il peso perch gia in passato passando dal classico porta mine economico di plastica a questi in metallo il limite che alla fine mi aveva fatto tornare ai primi  il peso che con un uso intenso dopo un p stanza veramente in questo caso seppur la matita non sia sicuramente leggera anzi il fatto che si riesca a impugnare molto vicino alla punta fa si che non si percepisca molto il suo peso in mano e quindi devo dire che alla fine non mi stanca particolarmente nella scrittura nel disegno di solito si avverte meno la cosa per il movimento pi lento riguardo al presunto problema del puntale che traballa nella sua sede essendo estraibile devo dire che durante lutilizzo veramente bisogna impegnarsi sul serio per riuscire a percepire qualcosa per me non sussiste proprio come impedimento anche se sicuramente rispetto alla sua sorella inore con punta fissa o a una qualsiasi altra matita meccanica senza punta estraibile se si va a giocare col dito sulla punta non trasmette la stessa fermezza dellelemento in conclusione devo dire che sono soddisfatto della matita sono contento di essermi levato questo sfizio perch di sfizio si tratta dato che il prezzo  sicuramente elevato se pensiamo che  una matita meccanica e non  che rispetto a quelle da  euro vadda chiss quanto meglio si scrive pressoch uguale lunica differenza  la piacevole sensazione che ragala come strumento pi esclusivo e di estetica e dato che la amtita la uso tutto il giorno volevo togliermi lo sfizio di averne una che mi piacesse tanto

prod_name: faber-castell grip plus set 130997 mechanical pencil-assorted color
title: ein meisterwerk der przision und haptik trotz des preises
review: while this is a premium product and an intimidating price tag for a mechanical pencil this product is beautiful and meticulously designedprosthe retractable tip helps prevent the tip from being bent and breaking unlike all other pencils with this designthe grip is excellent and the weight distribution allows it to sit comfortably in the handthis product is of a high quality and i have not experienced a mechanical failure for the three pencils i own in over  yearsneutral  preferencethis pencil is nearly entirely made of metal as such it is very heavy personally this is a pro and makes it feel like a quality productconsyou may as well assume that this thing doesnt come with an eraser just a lead stopperif you get a ding on the pencil the paint will be removed and exposed the raw metal beneath eye sore for perfectionistsdue to the heavy weight this pencil is difficult to write quickly with or do pencil tricks with

title: most beautiful and well designed tool on my desk
review: without doubt the best mechanical pencil i have ever bought in fact i would go as far as to say it is the best writing tool i have ever purchasedthe build quality is flawless solid metallic components everywhere really solid mechanism for revealing and retracting the tiploading can be a little fiddly and frustrating but this has been the case for every mechanical pencil i have ever hadi previously had one of these but the tip was bent by someone whilst i was away from my desk either that or the product failed replacement works just as wellrecommend the  over the  as mm lead is very fragile and i found it breaks frequentlyhighly recommended

prod_name: faber-castell grip plus set 130997 mechanical pencil-assorted color
title: broke after a month
review: i have owned a variety of mechanical pencils ranging from cheap to expensive brands and most have lasted me  years i decided to give this brand a try after it was highly recommended but unfortunately it stopped working after only a month the twisting mechanism at the top does not function properly and the tip does not stay steady enough for me to write a single letter i am baffled and dont even know how this could have happened truthfully a  mechanical pencil is more reliable and lasts longer than this supposedly wellknown product it has been an absolute waste of time and money i even tried to fix it without success the bottom line is that i will never purchase anything from this brand again i had high hopes and was enthusiastic about the product but unfortunately it has been nothing but a disappointment and an absolute waste of money thank you

title: roring  is awesome
review: the roring  is awesome the negative reviews that say there is some tip wobble are way over blown on this aspect there is a very little bit of wobble as there has to be in a moving part this is consistent as i have several of these for my work they all have the same amount of tip wobble  those reviewers who have such an issue with this aspect never actually discuss how the pencil performs tip wobble or not in practice the minuscule tip wobble is simply not an issue it is an outstanding pencil i am an artist and use it all the time as well as the rotring  and graphgear  these all have their strengths and purpose as do other pencilseven the wooden ones the  is a wonderful tool and built extremely well and the retractable tip works as it should and makes this a travel friendly alternative to the  and it is a pencil folkswrite with it draw with it enjoy it

prod_name: faber-castell grip plus set 130997 mechanical pencil-assorted color
title: the sliding collar tolerance is unfortunately abysmal
review: i really really really wanted to like this pencil due to the retractable tip and ability to carry it around without worry unfortunately the amount of play in the tip is so great that it simply cant be ignored i read a ton of reviews  watched loads of videos and bought this thinking that it cant be as bad as people made out in certain reviews but it unfortunately isthere is absolutely no reason why a pencil that clearly has top end machining and solidity elsewhere in the body has such an unacceptable amount of play in the key part of the pencil to be clear the part that extends and retracts has visible and very noticeable radial play between it and the section it slides up and down in to the point that it audibly clacks when youre writing with it it should be approaching an interference fit and be absolutely solid as a fixed tip for something that costs as much as it doesits current lax production format may be fine for casual writers and people coming to it green with few expectations or less demanding technicalprecision needs but when you compare it to its fixed tip sibling the  or the literal solid and precise bones of your hand extension that the pentel p is and writes like still in my humble opinion the greatest mechanical pencil on the planet today the difference is night and daycant recommend this at all and if youre thinking about it id say buy the  in the tip diameter you want without any worries and buy yourself another four ps with the money saved and fit a variety of different hardness leads in them for fun and variety youll be infinitely happier and better equipped in day to day pencil optionssorry rotring for this to be your flagship pencil you really should be doing better either sort your sliding mechanism tolerances out or add a sexy screw on cap to the  charge a fiver more for it and dump the

title: the rotring  i wasnt sure that i would like this pencil
review: reading the mixed reviews on the rotring  i wasnt sure that i would like this pencil also looking at the photos i thought the gold accents looked cheap in person this pencil looks anything but cheap the gold black and red is truly nice together the rotring  looks like a quality instrument when you pick it up and start to write its even better the mechanism that extends the sleeve has a satisfied spring the pencil is well balanced and nicely weighted one of the main concerns people have with the  is the sleeve there is a little bit of movement this is true but not enough for me to complain i work in the interior design industry and hand draw floor plans for carpets rugs and furniture i also take notes and write quotes with the rotring that little bit of movement has not affected my experience with the pencil i need to be able to carry the pencil in my shirt pocket or planner as well the retractable sleeve was the deciding factor to pick the  over the

prod_name: faber-castell grip plus set 130997 mechanical pencil-assorted color
title: the tip wobble really isnt that bad
review: no doubt if you are looking into a  quid pencil youll be doing your research and some of that will lead you to a lot of people saying that the retractable rotring has a slight tip wobble because its moving parts ive been using this daily for  over a year now and its still going strong im a massive fidgetter so im constantly popping the nib in and out and taking the rubber protector on and off and its still not gotten to a point where its worn or damaged this is my favourite pencil it weighs a really nice amount for me and feels like a good bit of kitthe improvements i think it could do with are minor the first is the little tab thing that you slide it onto shirt pockets and what not i think this should not be painted this area is the one that gets the most wear and naturally the paint chips itd made more sense to plain finish it the second is the availability of the rubbers the rubbers last ages but they are a little difficult to pickup in the end i opted to go for the ones direct from their site because they are a special size and didnt want to get the wrong onesbesides that though i really like the pencil id definitely recommend it if you are looking to upgrade to a something proper

title: lovely to use but it broke

prod_name: faber-castell grip plus set 130997 mechanical pencil-assorted color
title: pencil has serious quality issues
review: i love rotring pencils  in general they are essentially the best drafting pencils around both the rotring rapid pro and the rotring  are simply superb  having said all this it pains me to have to leave a negative review on the rotring  but what can i say  it is simply a bad product that is ridiculously overpriced  rotring touts the  as their cream of the crop mechanical pencil and it has a nifty twist mechanism which pops in and out and makes the pencil pocket friendly by removing the sharp point  and yes this twist mechanism does work however when you try to write with the pencil you will notice a lot of play in the metal tip  folks a mechanical drafting pencil is suppose to be precise  having a loose tip defeats the whole purpose of precise writing  the pencil does look quite attractive however that is why it gets two stars  otherwise it is complete garbage  if you want a high quality drafting pencil then buy either the rotring rapid pro or the rotring   if you want a pocket safe pencil then get the rapid pro  if you are not worried about the sharp point then buy the legendary rotring

title: dodgy batch  beware
review: i contacted derwent and explained the issues outline below they replaced the specific colours i was having issues with and though not professional quality obviously i have a set of consistent pencils that are actually useful and worth the money thank you derwent for the excellent customer servicehaving used and enjoyed derwent grahite pencils for some time i had enough confidence in the brand buy this set of coloured pencils ok i knew they were the academy ones and that they wouldnt be as good as the more professional choicehowever the quality of some of the pencils renders the set virtually useless for more than just basic colouring infirstly the colours of some pencils are questionable  the deep red is not significantly different from the red the light blue is a good deal darker than the blue the lime green and acid yellow are pretty similar and the black is nothing more than a dark graysecondly is how the pencils lay down pigment with some of the pencils they hardly lay down any colour at all with the purple pencil you feel like youre tearing through the paper just to get some colour on the page same with roseand bluefinally they dont blend all that well some colours do but a lot simply do not same thing with burnishinghaving used more expensive pencils in the past id recommend that you dont cut corners and just go straight to professional grade pencils youll have a lot more fun create more vibrant art and be a whole lot less frustrated in the processthis purchase feels a lot like  wasted

prod_name: faber-castell 111260 colour pencils (pack of 60),3.5 x 18.6 x 21 cm; 399.16 grams
title: wish i had found these first
review: these might be a middle quality pencil but they are nice note of thanks to those who do coloring books you seem to be driving the price down and the quality up from the student gradethey lay down smooth even colors that are as bright or as light as you want pressure on the pencil  the hexagonal shape makes them easier to use for longer times than the round pencils the core does not break at least i have not broken one yetcompared to prismacolor primer they are bolder colors lay down smother and actually blend much better  possibly due to fcs use of veggie oil instead of waxso far ive only used them with the prismacolors to get the detail and wet fresh paint look quicker so for those who know color pencils this does in one pass what the prismacolors does in  or   ive used them to get a color that i dont have in the prisma set  they also have some interesting colors not common in other sets gold silver copper i think i will use the prismas as an underpainting and then lay these down on top for that finished lookmy only complaint is that there is a consistency problem  some colors notably the lighter ones do not perform the same way the darker colors do  the light colors seem to be a much harder core  that means more passesalso  colors is fairly limited not a complaint just an observation for the serious artistfor the money im very happy with these and wish i had found them first

prod_name: faber-castell 111260 colour pencils (pack of 60),3.5 x 18.6 x 21 cm; 399.16 grams
title: excellent set
review: i like these colours very much  they blend beautifully and the assortment is very good  ive never had a core break and they sharpen to a fine point in my staedtler hand held sharpener  the only thing i have a problem with is getting real depth with the black pencil  fortunately it isnt a pencil i use often  probably when i am more used to coloured pencils ill figure it out  i mostly paint in watercolour and acrylic and there is definitely another learning curve with coloured pencils

prod_name: faber-castell 111260 colour pencils (pack of 60),3.5 x 18.6 x 21 cm; 399.16 grams
title: colour blending
review: the last colour pencil i had was twenty years ago and it was a set of  colour pencils from other brand this is a huge increase in terms of the choice of colours which is a luxury and at the same time new experience please note i have only tried those colours in blue here are my thoughts  some of the colours blend in very well with each other even up to four colours of blue blend in with each other as if it is natural not every colour blend some stand up as its own and can never be blended with others i assume these are best for the light as shown in the pictures it stands alone so you dont need to worry these colours will get intruded by others there are some to my surprise  has some shinny powder incorporated into the colour the idea behind is really nice as they are supposed to reflect and shine on the paper however pressure on these colours will actually reveal a darkgreyish colour instead of luxury reflective colour do note that i am still getting a hold on these colours my impression on these new shine powder incorporated into colour pencils might change over timeoverall i am satisfied and please note never let the colour pencils fall from the table the colour breaks instantlyupdatesdrew the last picture and i am actually quite satisfied with the performance of the color pencil those few pencil with shiny powder incorporated can never be used to blend with other colors but it has its own specialty and perhaps i might able to use them one day in some special things

namen die stiftenden sind gerade abgeschnitten und unlackiertdie minen zerbrechen kaum und lassen sich sehr gut anspitzen ein bereinanderlegen von mehreren farbschichten ist ebenfalls gut mglich radieren lassen sie sich gut mit einem weichen weien oder transparenten radierervon der farbzusammenstellung her sind es krftige farben die sich vor allem fr den schulunterricht eignen drften gedeckte farbtne hingegen zum zeichnen von naturalistischen landschaften pflanzen tieren portraits etc fehlen bis auf gedecktes olivgrn ansonsten sind alle farben klar krftig und leuchtend es gibt keine doppelten farbtne dazu kommen  metallicstifte in violett mittelblau blaugrn gold und silber die einen ganz dezenten schimmer habenfarbzusammenstellung wenige gelb und orangetne sehr viele rot und pinktne eine gute auswahl an blautnen eine auf den ersten blick etwas unharmonische auswahl an grntnen eine gute auswahl an brauntnen und zwei grautne dazu wei und schwarz das wei kann man zum malen auf dunklem papier verwenden zum setzen von glanzlichtern auf anderen farben eignet es sich nicht da es nicht stark genug pigmentiert ist wenn man die grntone nach farbnuancen gelblich blulich brunlich und nach helligkeitsstufen ordnet ergibt die auswahl sinndie minen sind von der hrte her alle gleichermaen weich bis auf ein helles gelbgrn und ocker diese beiden stifte sind in meiner packung schwcher pigmentiert und deutlich hrterdie leichte kartonage ist wahrscheinlich nur zum verkauf und versand gedacht nicht zur dauerhaften aufbewahrung der aufsteller aus dnnem karton ist standhaft und geschmackvolleinzelstifte kann man nicht nachkaufen eine farbkarte des herstellers gibt es auch nichtmerkwrdig ist dass fabercastell in denselben roten verpackungen gleichgltig ob title: we like em
review: i read a lot of reviews of various coloured pencils before buying these i am very happy with them im no expert but they are not on the waxy side i was looking for something less waxy so these are good for my uses they blend ok i used them on regular paper adult colouring book style as well as on a canvas like for painting paper was very good on the canvas they were really nice and the only thing id say to be wary of is that they smudge very easily i imagine waxy ones would smudge less so i like the finished product but just beware of smudging im going to look for some kind of spray on plastic coating to protect my masterpiece  from smudging i will definitely go with fabercastell again and now that i know what to expect i will invest in a bigger set to get more colour options

prod_name: derwent graphic soft graphite drawing pencils, ideal for illustrating & shading, set of 12, professional quality, 34215
title: derwents are some of the best around
reviewer: mz nina business consultant and aspiring artist
review: i looove this brand also all their colored pencil lines  i know everyone is prismacolor crazy but it is hype  derwents are just as good and i am a little partial to them simply they are the ones i learn to draw with even as a kid  i remember my first derwent kit that dad bought me  pencils and i was around  and we were living in australiai love the water color pencils the graphite the ink tense that you can actually draw on fabric with and it stays and the color soft line  i also have a few others but those are my favoritesi would say there pencils are as good as any other including prismacolorjust make sure to get the right pencil sharpener no matter what you use  get a derwent battery operated which is still made or a panasonic or a used huntboston all of which are no longer made  do not get xacto it chews your pencils up and constantly breaks the leadinfo on electric pencil sharpenersi am a color pencil artist and you need to have either a panasonic huntboston pencil sharpener otherwise your colored pencils are eaten  never buy xacto for colored pencils xacto will eat your pencils  until you can find a panasonic or huntboston or hunt or boston electric pencil sharpener get this if you can find one or the derwent black model as it had  holes one for a longer tip and one for a shorter tip  i have both  i had bought the derwent one as i have derwent but also use prismacolor and graphite  panasonic and hunt boston are no longer made no matter what anyone says  i was lucky to buy a new panasonic electric pencil sharpener by trolling the net until i found on  bought a used boston model  used on ebay and paid waaaay too much  it was pretty beaten upalso if you do buy used get one in the best quality that you can and just pay the extra i would say up to   i personally would not spend more than that  i paid  for my new panasonicalso xacto bought out huntboston and all new models are a  digit model number the actual huntboston is only a  digit  this issue is that xacto still sells under the hunt boston name and it is misleading as it now uses xacto cutters which do nothing but eat your pencils  i also do not like it when someone lies about what they are sellingi bought what i thought was a hunt electric pencil sharpener it came in a box that had the hunt name and packaging but when i opened it up it was a you guessed right  an xacto  said so right on the sharpenerbought on line here at amazon from overstockcom but i returned it and got a refund including shipping as they were misleadinghope this helps with those of you who are colored pencil artist  get a panasonic huntboston or derwent sharpeneralso run a graphite pencil through your sharpener first thing every day and it will stay sharp longer since colored pencils are waxy and tend to build up on the cutters

title: grundsortiment an farben
review: im lieferumfang befinden sich  buntstifte bei denen die auenfarbe jeweils der minenfarbe entspricht hinzu kommt noch dass goldfarbene wellenlinien und das logo von bic auf dem stift aufgedruckt ist hier wei ich nicht zu sagen ob es sich um ein rein optisches element handelt oder ob diese linien fr mehr grip sorgen sollen verpackt sind diese buntstifte in einer farblich ansprechenden papier umverpackung die allerdings nur mit einem klebestreifen wieder zu verschlieen istdie farbauswahl spricht mich an da es die grundfarben abdeckt durch ihre  eckige form liegen die farbstifte gut in der hand und sie malen wirklich gut bei groflchigem farbauftrag sind die farben deckend und auch feine linien knnen gut ausgefhrt werden dazu sind die farbauftrge sehr krftig und leuchten intensiv die minen sind schn weich aber trotzdem brechen sie nicht schnell ab oder werden zerdrckt wenn mal die buntstifte mal anspitzen mchte ist dies mit einem normalen anspitzer mglich allerdings sollte man drauf achten dass dieser auch scharf ist da sonst die spitzen mehr gedrckt als geschnitten werdetrotz dieser tollen stifte habe ich aber trotzdem einen kritikpunkt da man diese stifte ja mehrmals nutzen mchte und sie auch in einem hheren preissegment sich befinden htte ich eine verpackung erwartet die nicht gleich bei der ersten entnahme reit zudem wre es schn wenn man die stifte gleich auf einem blick sehen knnte und nicht erst eine reihe nach der anderen aus der verpackung nehmen msste  zwar gibt es in der mitte der verpackung eine aussparung in der man ein paar stifte sehen kann aber leider nicht das ganze spektrumzusammenfassend kann ich sagen dass mich diese buntstifte berzeugt haben da sie eine gute qualitt haben und auch sehr vielseitig anzuwenden sind lediglich bei der verpackung msste etwas gendert werden

prod_name: royal & langnickel sketching artist pencils - set of 12 drawing pencils 5h to 6b
title: good for starters
review: im really glad i made the investment for real artist pencils having the different varieties of darkness has helped me a lot in the last couple months since i got them  i dont do that full greyscale shading stuff barely breaking ground into general shading no way i can do that  but it makes it a lot easier for my drawings because instead of how i did it before where i would just try to draw the basic shapes and general outline with pencil usually mechanical lightly and then as i went each new layer would be slightly darker with the permanent stuff that i would trace over with pen as the darkest but then when i inked the drawing let the ink dry and go back to erase before coloring it was often very difficult to get rid of all the pencil lines because of how hard and dark i had to go with some of them  but now with these artist pencils i lightly do the basic shapes with the lightest pencil and as i go up in layers i go one or two pencils up for a darker line with minimal effort amd barely any pressure  the result is a group of line in varying degrees of darkness that can still be easily erased once i have inked the final outline and i dont have pesky persistent lines and pressure spots showing through my color  plus because you are using multiple pencils per drawing they last a lot longer before needing to be sharpened  the one i used most the h lasted almost two full months before needing to be sharpened and i still havent sharpened any of the others  my only beef is a cpuple of them have one spot on the led where its kind of scratchy and instead of gliding over the paper i can feel it catching  these are a good set for a starter or someone who doesnt intend to do full greyscale art like me i doubt i will ever need to move up to a larger or higher end set than this one

prod_name: royal & langnickel sketching artist pencils - set of 12 drawing pencils 5h to 6b
title: not enough tone difference between the hs and the bs
review: i had high hopes for this set of pencils because it contained several pencils that i havent had in previous pencil sets  i think the darkest ive had was a b or b and these went up to b  and i like how the b pencils get much softer and darker the farther down their scale you go unfortunately though there wasnt an extremely noticeable difference from the h all the way through to the b in this particular set of pencils i need the softer darker pencils to be very blendable and these just werent i made a chart where i colored a square using each pencil in order using the same amount of pressure in each one there really wasnt a big difference then i tried to shade over the squares to see if the blended or smudged well and you could still see all of the pencil hashmarks on every single one i dont expect the hs to blend barely at all but the hashmarks on all of the bs should have at least started to smudge the way i draw consists mainly of shading and tone differences ranging from really light to really dark pitch black  i mostly use a stump to blend all of it together and take turns alternating between my stump and my kneaded eraser to do the actual drawing to bring out the highlights and deepen the shadows these pencils just dont vary enough in the hardness for me im going to keep them though because i just dont feel like going through the trouble to send them back just to get my five bucks back i can always write letters with them right

prod_name: royal & langnickel sketching artist pencils - set of 12 drawing pencils 5h to 6b
title: great value pencils but the plastic sleeve is really annoying
review: im definitely no artist and i havent even done any sketching in well over ten years but i was keen to jump back in i remember i used to like b pencils but i thought id grab a mixed pack and try to gauge how they all lay down the quality seems great for the cost theyre presharpened the shaft seems to be natural wood so theres some variations in colour of the wood which adds a little interest more than anything else the graphite is transfers nicely and isnt too brittle i quite liked the h the b and b in particularthe only downside is that i find the plastic packaging sleeve bloody awful its too fiddly to keep the pencils in to keep them in good condition as the short top flap is very sharp and stiff and tries to dig into the leads as you slide the pencils back in cant even seem to get the plastic to accept a fold back in the other direction to get it to stay open

title: amazing quality lead no need for anything else
review: i bought  packs of these leads to go with my new mechanical pencil as i needed some replacementsi was not disappointed with the quality and durability of this brand having never bought this type of thing before and only using disposable pencils i was very pleased to find that this lead was just as tough and durable as the nano diamond lead that came with my pencilthey are also just as comfortable to write with the lead is smooth to the touch of paper and flows brilliantly an absolute pleasurenot only that but you get so many  leads at such an amazing price the stylish blue container they come in is very tough and keeps the lead safe inside and the mechanism in the twist cap to open is brilliant for controlling how many leads you wish to remove from the container at any one timethey arrived very quickly and in a well padded thick envelope very pleased with this purchase and i would highly recommend this product ill certainly be buying more when i eventually run outpros very durable high quantity smooth flowing stylish and durable container reminds me of an old ipod amazingly cheap well packaged quick deliverycons none so far very pleased
